name: Aforza
slogan: The Intelligent Future of Consumer Goods
description:
Aforza has released applications for Pricing, Ordering and Retail Execution. Aforza solutions utilise AI, ML and Mobile technology to give its customers differentiated improvements in revenue, employee efficiency, market reach and field effectiveness.

https://www.aforza.com/product

jobs.title: Sales Engineer
jobs.description:
The Aforza team is looking for a talented and passionate Principal Sales Engineer to bring our vision to life with creative and powerful demonstrations and presentations within our target segment. Key to this exciting role is the ability to play a leading role with a highly experienced and successful team.

In this role, you will be at the forefront of taking the Aforza product to market; exceeding customer expectations and disrupting competition. You will show customers how artificial intelligence and sustainability technology can transform the Consumer Goods industry. As CG leaders seek new ways to increase efficiency and effectiveness, build sustainable business that attracts and retain customers, you will help influence them to see Aforza as a trusted partner in their digital transformation journey.

You’ll create compelling field sales assets and experiences that communicate the value of Aforza in the language of the CG industry.

https://www.aforza.com/principal-sales-engineer
